name: Morpho
description:
Using fullscreen is highly recommended!

An adventure game following the stories of two bugs, a caterpillar, and a firefly. The caterpillar must collect leaves to get bigger and morph into a butterfly, while the firefly must escape from a spider chasing it down a dungeon. The chill mode follows the caterpillar, while the challenging mode follows the firefly. Feedback is appreciated, and I hope you enjoy!
